text:
This learning unit was created by students of the HTW Berlin (University of Applied Sciences Berlin) in cooperation with Wikimedia Deutschland e.V.

The project is based on the original concept by
Martin Boy, Anja Kammer, Timo Neumann, Laura Seidler.

Thank you!

headline: Revised Concept and Implementation
text:
Veronika Babic, Cristina Beltran Ramos, Simon Binder, Lina Kriebel, Mario Schütz, Vivian Zaddach: Lawyer Dude - A learning unit on using images from the internet without going to jail.

Unless indicated otherwise, this learning unit is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0). The full license text can be found at:

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/deed.de



This tool was supported by Wikimedia Deutschland e.V. (Christina Rupprecht/Elly Köpf)

headline: Disclaimer
text:
No legal advice!
This tool is designed to facilitate the compliant re-use of certain copyright-protected images. However, it can never cover all use cases and characteristics, and thus cannot replace qualified legal advice by a lawyer.
